description.value: This handheld unit includes an extendable wand tipped with a sampling nozzle, and can be easily operated with a single hand. It grants a +4 circumstance bonus to Engineering, Mysticism, and Physical Science checks to identify an unknown @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Drug}, medicinal, poison, or other chemical substance.
